serverInfo.name: Meta-AI
serverInfo.title: Meta AI
serverInfo.description: The Meta-AI MCP sends one question to many AI models at once — OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, xAI, Perplexity, Mistral, and more — and compares their answers side by side. It reveals how different systems reason, write, and decide, offering a transparent, multi-perspective view of AI thinking in real time.
